tool.name: Multi omics factorial analysis with muon
tool.command: pip install muon && python '$rna_atac_input' > '$script_file' > '$rna_atac_integration' import muon as mu import scanpy as sc

configfiles.configfile: import muon as mu import scanpy as sc mdata = mu.read("rna_atac_input.h5") mu.tl.mofa(mdata) sc.tl.umap(mdata) sc.pl.umap(mdata) mdata.write("rna_atac_integration.h5")

param.name: rna_atac_input
param.label: Multi Omics RNA ATAC data matrix

data.name: rna_atac_integration
data.label: Integrated Multi Omic Factorial Analysis Result

tool.help: **What it does** This tool performs multi omics factorial analysis using muon.mofa() It takes as input a H5 matrix with multiple modalities treated as a MuData object.
